text: Solenosteira is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Pisaniidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Solenosteira include: * Solenosteira anomala (Reeve, 1846) * Solenosteira cancellaria (Conrad, 1846) * Solenosteira capitanea Berry, 1957 * Solenosteira fusiformis (Blainville, 1832) * Solenosteira gatesi Berry, 1963 * Solenosteira macrospira (Berry, 1957) * Solenosteira mendozana (Berry, 1959) * Solenosteira pallida (Broderip & G. B. Sowerby, 1829) ==References== * Dall W.H. (1890). Contributions to the Tertiary fauna of Florida with especial reference to the Miocene silex-beds of Tampa and the Pliocene beds of the Caloosahatchie River. Part I. Pulmonate, opisthobranchiate and orthodont gastropods. Transactions of the Wagner Free Institute of Sciences, Philadelphia. 3(1): 1-200, pls 1-12. Category:Pisaniidae
title: Solenosteira
